Context:
The text mentions that George Brown College has Program Advisory Committees (PACs) which consist of industry representatives from various sectors including private and public sectors, companies, trade and professional associations, accreditation bodies, government, and the college. The committees provide advice on ensuring that graduates are ready to work in their industries and meet current needs and demands. PAC membership allows members to expand their professional networks.

Contact information for Dario Guescini, Director of Work Integrated Learning & Experiential Education, is provided for those interested in participating in program development. His contact details are: 416.415.5000 ext 3406 and dario.guescini@georgebrown.ca. The text also mentions that there are application deadlines, college news, upcoming events, tours, and more which can be signed up for on the website. The contact email for general inquiries is ask.george@georgebrown.ca.

Additionally, the text includes a land acknowledgment statement and contact information for George Brown College's main phone number 416-415-2000 and TTY number 1-877-515-5559. The text ends with a disclaimer stating that the information on the website is subject to change without notice.

No specific program or year information was mentioned in the text.
